meta.description: Shop for reasonably priced nuts and healthy snacks at Nutman. Nutman include a diverse selection of nuts sourced all over the world: United States Pecans and Almonds, China and Indian Cashew, Cambodia Dried mango slcies, and many other nuts.

head.title: Nutman | Shop Reasonably Priced Nuts At Ease
Nutman | Shop Reasonably Priced Nuts At Ease
Nutman | Shop Reasonably Priced Nuts At Ease

checkout.name: Name
checkout.deliveryCostWarningMessage: * We offer free delivery on order of $500 or above; A delivery cost of $25 will be added to your order since its currently below the thredshold
checkout.deliveryMethodReminder: * We will have your order delivered to the nearest SF station near your address; You will receive an SMS once the delivery has been arranged
checkout.inPersonInstruction: We will reach out via SMS to arrange in-person exchange time and location.
checkout.errorMsg: Please make sure you have filled out every fields

stripeMsg.something_went_wrong: Payment failed. Please retry or contact us

paymentSuccess.oops: Oops! You shouldn't be here. Returning you to home page.
paymentSuccess.paymentConfirmedMsg: Thank you! Your payment has been confirmed
paymentSuccess.rememberPaymentIdMsg: Please keep a copy of your payment ID; You will need to provide this for us to reference your order.
paymentSuccess.youWillReceiveEmailReceiptSoon: You will receive a email receipt soon. Should you have any questions or concerns, please contact us through Whatsapp.

404.badLink: It seems the page you're looking for no longer exists...

footer.address: Kin Wo Tong 127B Ma Tau Way Rd, Kowloon City, Kowloon, Hong Kong

step1.title: Add products to cart
step1.desc: You can find products from each category and add them to your cart.

step2.title: Fill out contact and delivery preference
step2.desc: You will receive email receipt and phone message with updates of your order status.

step3.title: Pay securely online with dozens of methods to choose from
step3.desc: You can choose to pay with credit card or with popular payment service provider like Alipay.

step4.title: Get delivered
step4.desc: You may choose to have your order delivered to the nearest SF station near your address. Or you may pick them up in-person -- in which we will contact you to set up a time and location that works for you.

step5.title: Order delivered
step5.desc: If you have any inquiry about your order, do not hesitate to reach us via our number at any time.
